Generation V.Black: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.
Generation V.White: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
Generation V.Black 2: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.
Generation V.White 2: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.

Generation VI.X: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
Generation VI.Y: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.

Generation V.Black: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass ) Received in the Dreamyard (if the player's first partner Pokémon was Tepig )
Generation V.White: Pinwheel Forest (inner) and Lostlorn Forest ( rustling grass ) Received in the Dreamyard (if the player's first partner Pokémon was Tepig )
